13860,"Minimalist.
The alox Bantam is VERY thin, and provides several functions.
In addition to the blade, you have the combo tool, which works as bottle opener, can opener, screwdriver and wire stripper.
I can vouch for the combo tool working well as a light-duty prybar, screwdriver, & staple remover.
A nice SAK for minimalists, or as a complement to other knives/tools.
,极简主义者。
alox Bantam非常薄，并提供多种功能。
除了刀片，你有组合工具，它作为开瓶器，开罐器，螺丝刀和剥线钳工作。
我可以保证组合工具工作良好，以及轻型撬杆，螺丝刀和钉拆卸器。
对于极简主义者来说是个不错的选择，或者作为其他刀具/工具的补充。
I bought this for my Condor 3 day assault bag.
This is great quality, the bit value is very good quality so you won’t be changing it all the time.
Even full it’s very slim so easy to wear and won’t interfere with other items you might be carrying.
The insulation of the tube is very good and at this price point is awesome.
You won’t be disappointed with this purchase.
,买吧。
我买这个是为了我的秃鹰3天突击包。
这是很好的质量，比特值是非常好的质量，所以您不会一直更改它。
即使是全套的，它也非常苗条，很容易穿，而且不会影响你可能携带的其他物品。
管子的绝缘性很好，在这个价位上真是太棒了。
你不会对这次购买感到失望的。

,0
13862,DOES THE TRICK!!.
I BOUGHT THESE TOESOXS FOR MY BARRE CLASS.
WITH THE GRIPPERS ON THE SOLES OF THE SOCKS, YOU DON'T NEED TO WORRY THAT YOU'LL LOSE YOUR BALANCE AND SLIP.
THEY GRIP THE FLOOR SO YOU DON'T NEED TO WORRY.
I LOVED THEM SO MUCH, I BOUGHT ANOTHER PAIR IN BLACK.
,做的很好！！。
我为我的BARRE班买了这些toesox。
袜子底上有夹子，你不必担心会失去平衡而滑倒。
他们抓住地板，所以你不必担心。
我太爱他们了，我又买了一双黑色的。

,0
13863,Do not waste your money.
All you need to know is that it will not sear a steak.
The legs are useless unless you like cooking from your hips.
If you live in a apartment and need a electric grill, Buy the Weber 140 or 240.
You will get what you paid for and more.
Believe me, I learned the hard way.
I went through three brands of electric grills before I spent the money on the Weber.
Nuff said.
,不要浪费你的钱。
你只需要知道它不会烤牛排。
腿没用除非你喜欢用臀部做饭。
如果你住在公寓，需要一个电烤架，买韦伯140或240。
你会得到你付出的更多。
相信我，我学会了艰难的道路。
在我把钱花在韦伯上之前，我看过三种牌子的电烤架。
努夫说。

,0
13864,A very good cam.
This is the first trail cam I've owned.
I haven't got it to the property I want to put it on yet, but have been using it around the yard to get familiar with it.
It takes excellent pictures during the daytime.
I haven't got many night pictures at night, so not really sure of what it does there yet.
Also I haven't used the video option yet, so not sure of it yet.
,非常好的摄像机。
这是我拥有的第一个轨迹摄像机。
我还没有把它送到我想穿的房子里，但我一直在院子里用它熟悉它。
它在白天拍得很好。
我晚上没有太多的夜景，所以还不确定它在那里做什么。
另外，我还没有使用视频选项，所以还不确定。

,0
13865,Great tri shorts.
Granted, these are the only tri shorts I've worn.
I'm only a couple years into the sport, and these have worked well over the 3 sprint tris I've done.
Quick drying, light chamois.
I'm 6' 3", with a 32" waist, and the mediums fit me well.
,很棒的三角短裤。
当然，这是我唯一穿的三件短裤。
我才参加这项运动几年，在我参加的3次短跑三项全能赛中，这些都发挥了很好的作用。
快干，轻麂皮。
我今年6尺3寸，腰围32寸，穿这种鞋很合身。

,0
13866,Excellent.
This device turns your iron sight AK into a rifle that you can add any optic you want.
I put a red dot scope on mine but you could easily add a laser, a tactical light, or a high powered scope.
The direction for removing the rear sight didn't work for me so I went to You Tube and found lots of videos on how to get the rear sight of with no problems.
This device turns great rifle into an excellent rifle
,杰出的。
这个装置可以把你的铁瞄准器AK变成步枪，你可以添加任何你想要的光学元件。
我把一个红点瞄准镜放在我的上面，但是你可以很容易地添加一个激光，一个战术灯，或者一个高功率瞄准镜。
移走后视镜的方向对我不起作用，所以我去了你的地铁，找到了很多关于如何让后视镜没有问题的视频。
这个装置把一支好步枪变成了一支好步枪

,1
13867,Best buy on the site!.
If you are an avid outdoors man, I mean the kind that will go hunt in the rain or shine then these are the scopes mount for you.
I love a nice rifle scope as well as anybody, but I also like my old iron sights for the foggy wet days.
These scopes mounts are perfect for both.
Very easy visibility in direct line of open sights.
Easy to mount, perfect fit!
I matched them up with a Simmons scope, again perfect fit.
,百思买网站！。
如果你是一个热衷于户外活动的人，我是说那种会在雨天或晴天去打猎的人，那么这些就是你的瞄准镜。
我和任何人一样喜欢一个好的步枪瞄准镜，但我也喜欢我的旧铁瞄准镜，以适应多雾潮湿的日子。
这些scopes挂载对两者都是完美的。
在开阔的视线中非常容易看到。
易于安装，完美贴合！
我把它们和西蒙斯望远镜匹配起来，再完美不过了。

,0
13868,no flats, not Kevlar.
No flats so far, the title says "Kevlar", but the package does not mention "Kevlar" just a "puncture resistant layer".
I though this was the same as one ones at Wal-Mart.
They are not.
If you want "Kevlar", this is not the package for you.
,没有公寓，没有凯夫拉。
到目前为止还没有公寓，书名是&#34；Kevlar&#34；，但包装上没有提到&ා34；Kevlar&ා34；只是一层&ා34；防穿刺层&ා34；。
我想这和沃尔玛的一样。
他们不是。
如果你想要凯夫拉，这不是你的包裹。

,0
13869,First Road Tubeless Tire for me.
These are my first road tubeless tires.
I did the Stans conversion on a powertap wheelset.Three weeks in - no problems yet.
The worst part is installing them.
You need a kung fu handgrip to get these on the rim, but from what I know of TLR tires this is expected.
However, once you get them on pretty minimal maintenance.My only negative is that they are a little skinny, but I switched to 25cc tires a year ago.
,我的第一个无内胎轮胎。
这是我的第一个无内胎轮胎。
我在电源开关上做了斯坦转换轮对。3几周了-还没有问题。
最糟糕的是安装它们。
你需要一个功夫的手把把这些在轮辋上，但从我所知道的TLR轮胎这是预期的。
不过，一旦你把它们减到最低限度维护。我的唯一不好的是它们有点瘦，但我一年前换了25毫升的轮胎。

,1
13870,GMC Denali XL road bike.
Not bad in the way of road bikes, it is a good entry level bike.
The brakes seem to be the lesser quality item on the whole bike.
Although it is very light, easy to shift, and much, much better on the road than a mountain bike.
Overall, this bike would be a good purchase for the person who would want to ride about 3 times a week.
A more serious rider, may require a more serious bike, but overall I am very happy.
,GMC德纳利XL公路自行车。
公路自行车的路况还不错，是入门级的好自行车。
刹车似乎是整个自行车质量较低的部件。
虽然它很轻，很容易移动，而且在路上比山地自行车好多了。
总的来说，这辆自行车将是一个很好的人谁想骑约3次一周。
一个更严肃的骑手，可能需要更严肃的自行车，但总的来说我很高兴。

,1
13871,Great product!.
I bought this mat because it has a larger size.
I use it on my carpet floor for Yoga, Cardio, push-up, and sit-up, and I love it.
I don't think it goes well with equipment cause it is too thin for heavy equipment.
Best price and quick delivery.
Amazon rocks!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
,很棒的产品！。
我买这个垫子是因为它的尺寸比较大。
我在地毯上练习瑜伽、有氧运动、俯卧撑和仰卧起坐，我很喜欢。
我认为它不适合装备，因为它太薄，不适合重型装备。
最好的价格和快速交货。

,1
13872,A gift that didn't work out.
I bought this as a gift for my girlfriend, who is an avid runner.
Unfortunately, the first unit I received didn't even power on.
Exchanged that one through amazon for another.
This one worked fine at first, but when she was actually about to use it the gps wouldn't turn on.
After fiddling around with it for a bit I somehow got it to turn on.
After that last time however it won't turn on again.
It really shouldn't be this difficult to use.
I wanted to like it, but this time I will just be getting a refund and using that money on a different gps watch.
,一份没用的礼物。
我买这个作为礼物送给我的女朋友，她是一个狂热的跑步者。
不幸的是，我收到的第一个单位甚至没有通电。
通过亚马逊把这个换成了另一个。
一开始这个很好用，但当她真的要用它的时候，全球定位系统不会打开。
在摆弄了一会儿之后，我总算把它打开了。
但在上次之后，它不会再打开了。
它真的不应该这么难用。
我想喜欢它，但这次我只会得到退款，并使用不同的gps手表的钱。

,0
13873,BODY BLADE FOR SHOULDER REHAB.
I HAD ARTHERSCOPIC SURGERY DONE JAN 16, '13.
IT WAS REALLY INVOLVED AND MY ROTATOR CUFF WAS RESTRUNG.
THE BODY BLADE HAS GIVEN ME THE ABILITY TO USE MY SMALLER MUSCLES AND GIVE BACK THE MUSCLE MEMORY NEEDED FOR THEM TO FIRE AGAIN.
I PLAN ON USING IT FOR OTHER MUSCLE GROUPS TOO.
IT'S BEEN A LIFE SAVER
,肩胛骨康复。
我在2013年1月16日做了眼科手术。
这真的很复杂，我的肩袖被重新绷紧了。
身体的刀锋让我有能力使用我较小的肌肉，并恢复肌肉记忆需要他们再次开火。
我也打算用它来锻炼其他肌肉群。
它是救命稻草

,0
13874,BAD CHOICE.
I loved this bed .. for about a minute.
I purchased this, sent it back due to  a leak.
I thought it was a fluke, bought another one.. same thing...
IT MUST BE A FLUKE  says the former believer in AEROBED products.... NOPE>> THREE .. THREE times I tried... all failed.
Never again... bought a SERTA..
,糟糕的选择。
我喜欢这张床。。大约一分钟。
我买了这个，因为泄密才寄回来的。
我以为是侥幸，又买了一个。。同样的事情。。。
以前相信气床产品的人说，这一定是侥幸。。。。不&#62；&#62；三。。我试了三次。。。全部失败。
再也不会。。。买了一辆塞尔塔。。

,0
13875,Works great for great price!.
These 45lb.
weight plates are far cheaper than any other weight plates I've seen.
As far as I'm concerned, a weight plate only has to do two things: fit on your barbell, and weigh what it is supposed to weigh.
I can't see why anyone would pay $50 or $75 or even over $100 for the fancier 45lb.
plates, when these work just fine for around $30.
,很好，价格也很贵！。
这些45磅。
配重板比我见过的任何其他配重板都便宜得多。
就我而言，一个负重板只需要做两件事：放在你的杠铃上，并称出它应该称的重量。
我不明白为什么有人会花50美元或75美元，甚至超过100美元来买更漂亮的45磅。
盘子，只要30美元就可以了。
Keep in mind this is a $80 cam.
The cam take blurried pic's at night if the deer move.
The trigger is slow and I placed this cam out with another brand this cam had 12 pic's the other had alot more.
I would say it's worth $50.
I will not buy another one.
I called Moultrie about they said it was right.I'm going to try the video and see if it is better.
,好的，卡姆。
记住这是一个80美元的摄像头。
如果鹿动了，摄像机会在晚上拍摄模糊的照片。
扳机很慢，我把这个摄像头和另一个牌子放在一起，这个摄像头有12张照片，另一张还有很多。
我想它值50美元。
我再也不买了。
我打电话给穆尔特里说他们说的是对的。我要试试录像，看看是否更好。

,1
13877,Great Product.
Great value with this product.
I did a lot of research prior to making my purchase, and it was quite obvious that this machine gave me the best bang for the buck.
It's no $5,000 commercial machine, but it's also not a $500 crappy tire model either.
For around $1,000, you really can't go wrong.
Easy to assemble, smooth motion.
The heart-rate monitor isn't accurate, and I don't like the placement of the water bottle holder.
Other than that, this thing is great.
,很棒的产品。
这个产品很值钱。
我在购买之前做了很多研究，很明显这台机器给了我最好的回报。
它不是5000美元的商用机器，但也不是500美元的烂轮胎模型。
1000美元左右，你真的不会出错。
装配方便，运动平稳。
心率监测器不准确，我不喜欢水瓶架的位置。
除此之外，这件事很棒。

,1
13878,Great purchase.
I drank the Crossfit cool aid.
They do some cool work outs with kettlebells.
When I had to leave the gym because I was moving I decided to buy a Kettlebell to keep up with my workouts at home.
I got the 35lb.
I'm 105lbs and this is a great kettlebell weight for me to do kettlebell swings, squats, etc.
The shipment came quickly, price, and quality are reasonable.
,买得好。
我喝了Crossfit冷饮。
他们用壶铃做一些很酷的运动。
当我因为搬家而不得不离开健身房时，我决定买一个壶铃来跟上我在家里的锻炼。
我拿到了35磅。
我是105磅，这是一个伟大的壶铃重量为我做壶铃摆动，蹲等。
发货很快，价格和质量都很合理。

,1
13879,Great Treadmill.
Love it.
Good deck, lots of good programs, fan, plenty of space for your 'stuff'.
Only quibble (and I mean only) - every program begins at .5 miles an hour and that is just way too slow.
Would be okay if could speed it up - although can speed it up a bit at the end.
Otherwise - fantastic and would definitely order it again.
And we have worn out 2 treadmills - meaning we really use them!
,很棒的跑步机。
喜欢它。
好的甲板，很多好的节目，风扇，足够的空间放你的“东西”。
只是一个狡辩（我的意思是唯一的）-每个程序以每小时0.5英里的速度开始，这太慢了。
如果能加快速度就可以了——虽然最后能加快一点。
否则-太棒了，肯定会再点一次。
我们已经磨损了2台跑步机-这意味着我们真的在使用它们！

,0
13880,great cap for cycling.
I like "headsweats"...they always make great products.
This one is nothing less but I must warn potential buyers, this hat has a seam that runs along the bottom of the hat(I guess to catch sweat).
This seam tends to get annoying with used with a helmet on a long ride.
,骑自行车的好帽子。
我喜欢头巾，它们总是做很好的产品。
这顶帽子没什么大不了的，但我必须提醒潜在的买主，这顶帽子的底部有一条缝（我想是为了吸汗）。
在长途旅行中戴头盔时，这条缝很容易让人讨厌。

,1
13881,Fantastic!.
This is definitely my favorite ""gadget"" for 2012!
These tiny little rubber things hold my eyeglasses in place in such a good way, that I really forget that I have them on my eyeglasses!
I received them earlier this morning, I put them on right away..and believe me, it feels sooo good that my eyeglasses don't fall from my head!So I give 5 stars, without any doubt!
,好极了！。
这绝对是我2012年最喜欢的“小玩意”！
这些小小的橡胶东西把我的眼镜固定得很好，以至于我真的忘了我的眼镜上有它们！
今天早上我收到了，我马上就戴上了。相信我，我的眼镜没有从我的头上掉下来感觉真好！所以我毫无疑问地给了5颗星！

,0
13882,Pump it up BEFORE you need it..
Because it needs to "stretch out" a little.
Pump it up, sleep on it, pump it up again, sleep on it again.
Now you should have stretched out all the creases.
It will hold air well.
2 weeks after camping, it's still fully inflated.
In fact, we "camped out" in our yard last night & did not need to fill it anymore.
,在你需要它之前把它加满。。
因为它需要伸展一下。
振作起来，睡在上面，再振作起来，再睡在上面。
现在你应该把所有的折痕都伸出来。
它能保持空气流通。
露营两周后，它仍然充满了气体。
事实上，我们昨晚在院子里扎营，不需要再填了。

,0
13883,Nice clean ammo cans.
I ordered the buy 2, get one 30 cal ammo can free deal and I got 2 ""100 round linked 50 cal"" cans with one NATO 7.62 linked ammo can inside one.
The cans are clean, work fine, seal tight.
There was a dent in one of the 50 cal cans, as if a heavy can was dropped onto it, but that is to be expected.
Dent more or less was worked out by pushing against it.
,好干净的弹药罐。
我订购了购买2，得到一个30卡弹药可以免费交易，我得到了2个“100轮连接50卡”罐头和一个北约7.62连接弹药罐内。
罐子是干净的，工作正常，密封严密。
其中一个50卡的罐子上有一个凹痕，好像有一个很重的罐子掉在上面，但这是意料之中的。
凹痕或多或少是靠着它挤出来的。

,1
13884,Great Hooks.
These hooks are perfect for the gym.
Since they are metal, I know they can handle whatever weight i put on it.
The hooks can fit onto Olympic bars, dumbells, or pretty much whatever you want.
They are very comfortable and distribute the weight well.
If you buy the gripper tubes, make sure you have the hook on the right rung for yourself, otherwise you will have to cut them off and buy new gripper tubes.
,很棒的钩子。
这些钩子非常适合健身房。
因为它们是金属的，我知道它们能承受我加在上面的任何重量。
钩子可以挂在奥运会的酒吧，哑铃，或几乎任何你想要的东西上。
它们很舒服，重量分配得很好。
如果你买了夹持管，确保你自己的钩在正确的横档上，否则你将不得不切断它们，并购买新的夹持管。

,0
13885,Putting Tool.
I do think the way it is designed, it is fairly difficult to miss a putt, unless you really push or pull the ball.
Most putts seem to find the hole as I make far more 7 footers with this tool than anything on an actual golf course.
That said, it's easy to use, it works well, and it provides a good practice tool.
Good value for the money.
,放东西的工具。
我认为按照设计的方式，很难错过一次推杆，除非你真的推或拉球。
大多数推杆似乎找到了洞，因为我用这个工具比任何实际的高尔夫球场都要多出7英尺。
也就是说，它易于使用，工作良好，并提供了一个良好的实践工具。
物有所值。

,0
13886,Fell apart after two weeks.
Was excited when this screen house arrived.
Set it up easily and like the construction and light weight.
Left up for two weeks under a tree on a patio.
Came home one evening and it appears the material tore under the stress of the poles on top.
The sleeves holding the poles had split down the middle, causing the whole structure to collapse.
There was no wind or strong rain.
Appears the material just tore from exposure after only two weeks.
,两周后分崩离析。
当这个放映厅来的时候很兴奋。
安装方便，结构简单，重量轻。
在院子里的树下呆了两个星期。
一天晚上回到家，材料似乎在顶部的电线杆的压力下撕裂了。
支撑柱子的袖子从中间裂开，导致整个建筑倒塌。
没有风也没有大雨。
似乎材料刚从曝光两周后撕下。

,0
13887,SR9c Holster.
I just got it.
The first thing I noticed is that this look like a very well built holster (great quality).
Whether I have it near the back of my pants, the side or the front with my Ruger SR9c in it, it seems comfortable in all positions.
Personally I find the front to be the best since there is no bulge from the gun what so ever.
The gun just fits so perfect in the holster also.
,SR9c皮套。
我刚拿到。
我注意到的第一件事是，这看起来像一个非常完善的皮套（质量很好）。
无论我的裤子后面，侧面还是前面有我的橄榄球SR9c，它似乎在所有的位置都很舒服。
就我个人而言，我觉得前面是最好的，因为从来没有从枪鼓什么。
这把枪也正好放在枪套里。

,0
13888,Daughter likes it.
Daughter likes that it keeps her water colder longer and likes the loop on it.
she uses a caribiner to clip it to whatever she wants, backpack, purse, etc.
I only gave it 3 stars because it seems a tad short for the bottle.
I have a nalgene with an older cover and it fits perfect to the base of the neck - hers is about 1" shorter.
doesn't bother her, but glad it's not mine!
,女儿喜欢。
女儿喜欢它让她的水更冷更长时间，喜欢它的环。
她用卡里宾夹在任何她想要的东西，背包，钱包等。

13919,Protect your drysuit zipper..
Use this on your brand new zipper, or old zipper to increase sliding ease and make your zipper last longer.
Works best when applied in excess on the first application to fill in all gaps between zipper teeth.
Then wipe off excess after exercising the zipper several times.
Does NOT need to be applied every dive.
Simply re-apply when zipper becomes harder to zip, or wax is visibly gone from zipper.
,保护你的干衣裤拉链。。
在你的新拉链或旧拉链上使用这个来增加滑动的舒适性，使你的拉链更耐用。
如果在第一次使用时使用过量，以填补拉链齿之间的所有间隙，效果最佳。
然后擦掉多余的运动拉链几次。
不需要每次潜水都使用。
当拉链变得更难拉，或者拉链上的蜡明显脱落时，只需重新使用。

14210,If it doesn't work for you....
...check to see if the chuck on your air pump has its own air valve.
Unlike an actual Schrader valve, this adapter lacks the pin that is supposed to hold open a chuck valve.
This adapter won't work with a lot of the cheap electric air compressors currently being sold.
A work around (assuming the chuck can be disassembled) is temporarily removing the chuck's valve.
,如果对你不起作用。。。。
…检查气泵上的卡盘是否有自己的气阀。
与实际的Schrader阀不同，该适配器缺少用于保持卡盘阀打开的销。
这种适配器无法与目前出售的许多廉价电动空气压缩机配合使用。
解决办法（假设卡盘可以拆卸）是临时拆卸卡盘的阀门。

14490,Stay Dry in this tent.
This is by far the most weather proof tent I have used.
I camp with the Boy Scouts regularly in terrible weather.
The troop has some of the regular Timberline 4 tents and they leak often.
However, I purchased the Outfitter model on my own and it was well worth it.
I stayed perfectly dry when other dome tent's poles were snapping and filling with water.
This tent stays up in the worst storms when it is staked properly.
I can set this tent up by myself in about 10-15 minutes.
This tent has a thicker material in the floor and the zippers and other fastenters are more ruggedly built than the regular Timberline.
All the seams are factory tape sealed and I have never had to use seam sealer on it.

14493,Decent Night Vision for the Price.
This monocular isn't without fault, but it does represent a good value at the price point.
It operates well in the lowest of low light conditions and the adjustable IR illumination works great.
The power switch is too close to the other adjustment switches, so I turned the unit off by accident on several occasions.
I also wish that the buttons were more intuitive and defined.
Zoom should be a toggle switch, like on a portable video camera.
It seems like the device goes through battery life pretty quickly and the field of view at close ranges is very narrow.
All in all, however, I felt this was an excellent value.

A tent is a tent, right?
Yeah, but I don't have to spend my time sorting poles and weaving them through tiny holes, only to finish with a lopsided tent.
This tent is so easy to set up and take down, it is surprising that more tents don't share the technology.
Setup and tear-down are under 5 minutes, and could easily be around 1 minute if you want to race.
I would rate it as slightly more sturdy than a standard tent with similar fabric durability.
I can't comment on how well rain is kept out, but I don't foresee that being an issue.
I am very pleased with my purchase!

There are a lot of tools it provides and I have used almost all of them.
None of the tools have worn out or broken.
The only issue I have is the three way Allen key tool.
It is a great idea but it makes making adjustments difficult.
It is too short to reach between the wheel to the rear brakes.

It was a lot to ask from a derailleur over 5 years with little to no care or attention.
IT definitely lived a hard life.
I had no hesitation about replacing it with another XT, and this is the shadow variant which is much slimmer to be less in the way of danger on a ride.
I expect this to last just as long, if not longer.
,值得-XT/XTR总是这样。
我惊讶地发现，我的XT后变速器终于过去了-它采取了太多的抨击，已经被忽视太久了，笼子被损坏了一点。
一个出轨者在5年多的时间里问了很多问题，几乎没有关心或关注。
它确实过着艰苦的生活。
我毫不犹豫地将它换成了另一个XT，这是一个影子的变种，它更苗条，以减少在路上的危险。
我希望这能持续同样长的时间，如果不是更长的话。

15049,Boric acid powder.
I bought this to make ant killer.
Saw the recipe online.
Here it is: 1 cup sugar, 1 tbsp boric acid powder, 3 cups water.
Mix well.
Put cotton balls into the lid of a mason jar or other small container.
Fill to top with mixture.
Let ants eat.
They will take to nest and die.
Works like the product Terro but cheaper.

用混合物填满。

The few dollars more in cost is certainly worthwhile.

15800,how to correctly unsheathe the knife.
I've seen in the reviews on how people have been having a hard time unsheathing this knife.
It's extremely easy to unsheathe it.
All you have to do is prop the knife to the side first so that the clamps in the the sheathe will dislodge.
If you unsheathe it by pulling it straight out, it will of course be very difficult to take it out.
Push or pull to the knife to dislodge it first, then pull it straight up.

15958,Works well if you keep everything tight and remember to release locks.
These rollers work really well and are easy to install.
I have loaded a 14 and 13 ft kayak several times now on a lifted SuperDuty with no issues.
I can now easily load and unload them all by myself.
Two important things to remember are to check the bolts frequently as they don't come with lock washers and should and to remember to unlock them or they will move on the bars.
I will be installing star lock washers on each bolt to hopefully keep them from loosening up.

16137,Instructional.
The SKLZ Sport Performance Trainer Mat is, I believe, 4 inches longer than a typical yoga mat.
I really like that it has illustrations and instruction for two dozen exercises.
Most of the illustrations show the beginning and ending position or movement and which muscles are being worked.
It also suggests how long to hold and how many reps to do.
The mat is neither slippery nor sticky.
The reverse side is blank.
This is a nice mat and the instruction is an excellent bonus.
,指导性的。

大多数插图显示了开始和结束的位置或运动，以及哪些肌肉正在工作。
它还显示了要坚持多久以及要重复多少次。

16206,Not good for handgun.
I tried to set up a charge for a 45 ACP, I followed the directions and then threw some test charges onto my digital scale.
I threw twenty test charges, every one was different, a few actually only measured .1 grains.
I decided to look into this and found that this bar has it's quirks, it seems to be the perfect choice for larger loads since the cavity is more apt to fill with powder when it's so large.
So I think if you're reloading any kind of rifle this is a better alternative to stacking your disks.
,不适合用手枪。

我决定调查一下，发现这个酒吧有它的怪癖，它似乎是一个完美的选择，为更大的负荷，因为洞更容易填补粉末时，它是如此之大。

The boken remains usable.

17238,Toe Overlap Problem.
This bike has terrible toe overlap.
In other words, the front tire will hit your foot at 3 o clock and 9 o clock when making sharp turns.
This is an extremely dangerous design for a young person's bike.
You can even see it in the Amazon picture.
Take a look at the position of the pedal next to the front wheel.
Now imagine your foot on the pedal.
Finally imagine making a sharp turn - not a pretty site.
,脚趾重叠问题。
这辆自行车的脚趾重叠得很厉害。
换言之，前胎在急转弯时会在3点钟和9点钟撞到你的脚。
对于年轻人的自行车来说，这是一个极其危险的设计。
你甚至可以在亚马逊的图片上看到。
看一看前轮旁边踏板的位置。
现在想象你的脚踩在踏板上。
最后想象一下做一个急转弯-不是一个漂亮的地点。

I'm 6'2"" & 225 lbs and I think I'm a bit too heavy for it.
